vignette:
Objects that Support Time Values
This is a list of Max and MSP objects that support Max time value syntax.
Max Objects
delay
delay time can be fixed or tempo-relative
quantization is tempo-relative
makenote
duration can be fixed or tempo-relative (must be single-valued)
metro, clocker, qmetro
interval can be fixed or tempo-relative
quantization is tempo-relative
autostarttime is tempo-relative (position)
speedlim
interval can be fixed or tempo-relative
quantization is tempo-relative
pipe
delay time can be fixed or tempo-relative (must be single-valued)
timepoint
trigger is tempo-relative (position)
timer
output can be in ticks
translate
converts from any fixed or relative time value to any other fixed or relative time value
MSP Objects
curve~, line~
envelope times can be single valued fixed or tempo-relative
delay~
delay time (normally in samples) can be fixed or tempo-relative
phasor~
interval (inverse of frequency) can be tempo-relative
adsr~
envelope times can be fixed or tempo-relative
snapshot~
auto-reporting interval can be fixed or tempo-relative
vst~
no time-based values accepted, but listed here because it synchronizes plug-in with transport
